nodes.text: The BT X-42 heavy flame projector, or known simply as the clone flamethrower, was a model of flamethrower used by the specially trained clone flametroopers during the Clone Wars. Clone flametroopers were deployed at the Second Battle of Geonosis to use this weapon against the native Geonosians, which were unarmored and therefore particularly susceptible to the flamethrower.
